snippet: A bus hit an overpass as it was heading into the arrivals section on Saturday morning, killing two people and critically injuring three others on board.
abstract: Bus hits an overpass as it is heading into the arrivals section at Miami International Airport, killing two people and critically injuring three others on board.
lead_paragraph: A bus hit an overpass as it was heading into the arrivals section on Saturday morning, killing two people and critically injuring three others on board.

headline.main: 2 Dead in Accident at Miami Airport
headline.print_headline: 2 Dead in Accident at Miami Airport
